sentences.english: The whole platter of nuts symbolizes the wish that the couple can have their own child soon.
sentences.chinese: 大淺盤中的乾果象徵着新婚夫婦能早生貴子的祝福。

sentences.english: Wishes you to grow old together, lives early expensively sub.
sentences.chinese: 祝你們白頭到老，早生貴子。
